attributes.action: Reduce the National Speed limit to 55mph (88kmh) to reduce emissions,reduce motoring costs,reduce the severity of road accidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
55mph (88kph) is the most economic speed.At that speed most cars can achieve perhaps 50mpg. At 70 consumption increases dramatically to perhaps only 35.The majority of motorists only drive a short distance to work and might add only a few minutes to their overall journey time. But they would dramatically reduce their fuel costs, reduce emissions, reduce wear and tear and  importantly reduce the severity of road accidents.
Does not that make sense and put money in our pockets?
